name: Post Slider – Sangar Slider Addon
author: tonjoo

sections.description:
Post Slider is a high quality Sangar Slider addon for WordPress.
Using Post Slider, you can create beautiful, intiuitive and responsive slider based on your post or category.
Post Slider is very easy to use, only with few clicks you can make beautiful slider based on your post or category.
Post Slider is an addon of Sangar Slider. You must have Sangar Slider installed to use this plugin

Features :

  • Fast and Smooth Animation
  • Create Slider Based on Post or Category
  • Ultra Responsive
  • Beautiful, Pre-defined Template
  • Integrated Seamlessly with Sangar Slider
  • Touch and swipe gesture
  • Easy to use

Plugin Demo
You can try the plugin on this url: http://coba.tonjoostudio.com

  • username: coba
  • password: 123456

*if you have any questions,comment,customization request or suggestion please contact us via our Tonjoo Forum

Find more detail on our official plugin page : Sangar Slider

Or you can find our best plugins at Tonjoo Studio

We can also modify your WordPress plugins according to your needs. Visit us : Tonjoo WordPress Developer

Usage Instruction

  1. Install Sangar Slider plugin.
  2. Install Post Slider plugin.
  3. In the Admin Panel, Go to Sangar Slider > Post Slider
  4. Add new slide
  5. Fill the setting according your need
  6. Read Documentation for more detailed instructions
sections.installation:
1. Grab the plugin from from wordpress plugin directory or Upload the post-slider folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin
sections.changelog:
1.3

  • Sangar core updated (see Sangar Slider changelog)
  • Bugfix slider with dummy data
  • [Pro] Added post category, post tag, and product category layer component
  • Compability to WordPress 4.8

1.2

  • Major bug fixed
  • Compability to WordPress 4.7

1.1

  • Major bug fixed
  • Compability to WordPress 4.7

1.0

  • Initial launch

  2. Activate the plugin
